blocks.comment: This variable holds the docs header with all the project information

inputs.displayValue: Create File on Amazon S3 ({ $.getProject.name } Project Documentation.html)

inputs.value:
Qlik Talend Cloud Project Details

ID: {trim: {$.getProject.id}}

Name: {trim: {$.getProject.name}}

Description: {trim: {$.getProject.description}}

Tenant ID: {trim: {$.getUser.tenantId}}

Space Name: {trim: {$.getSpace.name}}

Owner Name: {trim: {$.getUser.name}}

Document Created On: {date: 'now', 'd/m/y H:i T'}

{trim: { $.vTableOfContents }}
{trim: { $.vTaskDetails }}
